line_1: And lengthen out each added clause,
line_2: And faint upon each touching pause,

line_1: An' with rhetoric clause on clause
line_2: Some o' you nicely ken the laws,

line_1: An' with rhetoric clause on clause
line_2: To round the period an' pause,

line_1: An' with rhetoric clause on clause
line_2: Then echo thro' Saint Stephen's wa's
